name: cloudphobia
description: In this pulse-pounding arcade style shoot 'em up, players control giant armored robots, loaded with hi-tech weaponry. Chose from two types of mechs: the PLG-90, armed with a high-tech laser rifle or the NúllPunktur with the Vibroblade!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® 1 GHz Processor or comparable Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9-level Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® 2 GHz Processor or comparable Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9-level Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
